properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 11 at 2:48AM EST until February 11 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Seas 4 to 6 ft expected. Southeast winds 15 to 20 kts
with gusts to 25 kts.

* WHERE...Southeast North Carolina and Northeast South Carolina
coastal waters.

* WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 9 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM EST THIS EVENING
